item.title: How Rhubarb Conquered Germany, Then the World
item.description: Rhubarb is a plant that has been cultivated for centuries, but it wasnâ€™t until the 19th century that it became popular in Germany. The plant was initially brought to Europe from China, and it was used primarily for medicinal purposes.
